item.description:
You are invited to the Salem pug meetup !

When: May 9th (RAIN OR SHINE)
Time: 9am-10:30am
Cost: $5 per dog - pay at the door (please bring exact change)
Where:
Wags Doggie Daycare
Iron Rail Building
91 Grapevine Road
Wenham, MA 01984
Phone: 978-468-9924

meetup organizer: Jodi Webster
jwebster@mitre.org

Lisa Kane, owner of Wags, has graciously allowed us to rent her space. Her facility has plenty of parking and there is no limit to the amount of people who can come to these meetups! The space has indoor and outdoor play areas and both are fully enclosed. All pugs are off leash and safe.
Email: wagsdoggiedaycare@yahoo.com


Thanks everyone!

group.name: The Northshore MA Pug Meetup Group

item.name: The Northshore MA Pug June Meetup
